5.84.text:

10.63.text:
Once again I’m speaking for myself which

16.49.text:

41.55.text:

I have trouble making those for my family
so making the decision of what someone else’s

53.17.text:
job in healthcare should be like who is in

57.03.text:

75.18.text:
To me the way I was brought up in western

87.88.text:

the government should only use force for things

293.92.text:
So the question becomes what would I use a

298.89.text:
Now I’m a coward and I have no skills with

304.84.text: I’ve never hit a person in anger in my life.

312.71.text:
But if I were not a coward would I use a gun

320.13.text:
Would I use a gun to stop someone from being

324.15.text: Would I use a gun to build a library?

326.89.text:

547.17.text:
